welcome_message_title: Welcome to Villanueva de la Canada
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villanueva de la Canada! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The terminal for domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal, mainly used by Iberia and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal, mainly used by SkyTeam and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: The satellite terminal for Terminal 4, used by non-Schengen flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 15 minutes.
